item.title: ðŸ˜¨ So many AWS accounts, so much information!?
item.description: How can I query multiple AWS accounts for a lot of information. Well theres a few ways we can do this. Honestly what I believe is that leveraging a cross account role in each account is one the best ways to approach this. This allows for us to have the one spot for control and access. If you have a way to deploy this role in an automated way, that would be best.
